title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build and scale AI: from reliable agents to transformative systems (INV204)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建和扩展AI：从可靠的智能体到变革性系统 (INV204)
abstract: Many teams move fast with agentic AI prototypes that impress in demos but stall in production—blocked by gaps in reliability, accuracy, and safety. In this session, AWS agentic AI technical leaders will help builders rethink how to build and scale production-grade, trustworthy agentic AI. Learn proven patterns to build and deploy agents that earn trust in the real world. See AWS agentic AI platform Amazon Bedrock AgentCore in action. Discover how AWS customers move fast from sparks of experiment to scaled AI-driven innovation with trust at the core, transforming industries.
abstract_cn: 许多团队在代理式AI原型开发中进展迅速,在演示中令人印象深刻,但在生产环境中却停滞不前——受阻于可靠性、准确性和安全性方面的差距。在本次会议中,AWS代理式AI技术负责人将帮助构建者重新思考如何构建和扩展生产级、可信赖的代理式AI。学习经过验证的模式,构建和部署在真实世界中赢得信任的代理。了解AWS代理式AI平台Amazon Bedrock AgentCore的实际应用。探索AWS客户如何以信任为核心,从实验火花快速推进到规模化AI驱动的创新,从而实现行业转型。
